Method Detail

object_Serialize

public static void object_Serialize(java.lang.Object O,
                                    java.io.File file)
This method will save (serialize) the passed instance (Object O) to the file specified in file variable. Whatever object serialized this must implement this serializable interface. Also all objects referenced within this object must also implement the serializable interface.

Parameters:
O - Any instance of any class casted into Object
file - The file to save the object into

object_Deserialize

public static java.lang.Object object_Deserialize(java.io.File file)
This method will extract (deserialize) an instance of an object that serialized (saved) into file. After extract it will upcast the instance into type Object and return it as an Object. All objects that are deserialized this way must implement the serializable interface.

Parameters:
file - The file to read the object from
Returns:
the Object that was read in.

object_Clone

public static java.lang.Object object_Clone(java.lang.Object O,
                                            java.lang.String tempFileLocation)
This method will create a clone of any object passed into it, and return a handle to the clone as an object.

Parameters:
O - Object that needs to be cloned.
tempFileLocation - Temporary Folder to use for making the clone.
Returns:
clone of the object.
